citation: Vehicle and Traffic (Offence Detection Devices) (Rescission) Regulations 2023 (Tas)
text:
Vehicle and Traffic (Offence Detection Devices) (Rescission) Regulations 2023

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Vehicle and Traffic Act 1999 .

11 July 2023

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Infrastructure and Transport

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Vehicle and Traffic (Offence Detection Devices) (Rescission) Regulations 2023 .

2. Commencement
    These regulations take effect on the day on which their making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Legislation rescinded
    The legislation specified in Schedule 1 is rescinded.

4. Rescission of regulations
    These regulations are rescinded on the first anniversary of the day on which these regulations took effect.

SCHEDULE 1 - Legislation rescinded

Regulation 3

Vehicle and Traffic (Offence Detection Devices) Regulations 2022 (No. 76 of 2022)
                                                                                 


Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 19 July 2023

These regulations are administered in the Department of State Growth.
